data.name: Warface - Female nanosuits set
data.detailed_description:
Female nanosuits set


Cutting-edge technology is not standing still, contributing to the creation of various military uniforms. The female nanosuit is a vivid example of the armor of the future, which is not inferior to the male version. It is multifunctional, suitable for battle on different continents and in all weather conditions. Stylish black color, fitting exoskeletal armor, does not hinder movement and has an intimidating look. What could be better? In such a suit, brave women can withstand any enemy.



This skin increases the overall sprint distance by 50%.
data.about_the_game:

data.short_description: A set of unique skins for four Warface classes
data.supported_languages:
Russian*, English*, French*, German*, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Polish*, Turkish
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i3-530 / AMD Athlon II X3 415e
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 250 GTS / Radeon HD 4850
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i5 3470 / AMD Athlon 240GE
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 1050 Ti / Radeon R9 380
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
